function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncontrolled analysis of multiple variables","Impact":"Potential inaccurate or misleading results","Mitigation":"Conduct controlled analysis with fewer variables or use advanced statistical techniques","Technologies":"Advanced statistical software for multivariate analysis","People":"Research analysts, statisticians","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Incorrect coding of categorical variables influencing correlation/association analysis results","Impact":"Misinterpretation of data relationships","Mitigation":"Thorough review of coding methods and consideration of alternate coding approaches","Technologies":"Statistical software for coding and data analysis","People":"Data analysts, statisticians","Owner":"Data analysis team"},{"Description":"Implicit order of variables impacting analysis approach","Impact":"Misclassification of variables and inappropriate algorithm selection","Mitigation":"Careful consideration of variable nature and selection of appropriate analysis approach","Technologies":"Statistical software with support for ordinal variable analysis","People":"Data analysts, statisticians","Owner":"Data analysis team"}]}
